trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Unruly patrons have Yamehwi at wit's end.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_TODO_00<tab>Collect well water.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_TODO_01<tab>Use the well water to sober up unruly patrons.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Yamehwi.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_001<tab><sigh> Now what am I supposed to do?
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_002<tab>Say, you strike a rather imposing figure. Can I ask a favor of you?

TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_003<tab>A few of our regulars have gotten a little too deep in their cups, and all their commotion is starting to turn away customers. They refuse to leave, and there's not much more I can do without stirring up trouble.

TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_004<tab>Someone as intimidating as you, on the other hand, could get away with a great deal. In fact, I'd wager you could douse them with water and they'd sooner go home than lift a finger against you. There's a well not far from here if you'd be willing to try and sober them up.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_005<tab>Between you and me, they could all stand to take a bath anyway. A quick drenching with water from the well should bring them to their senses.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENB05120_000_020<tab>Hey, do you... Do you know <hic> what time it is? I suppose it doesn't matter.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENB05120_000_021<tab>Pffft! What was that for!?
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENB05120_000_022<tab>Dammit, now I need to go and get changed.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENC05120_000_025<tab>No, no, no! I don't wanna hear it! I don't pay you to talk─now go and get my drink!
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENB05120_000_026<tab>Bugger me with a rroneek's horn, that's cold! What're you trying to do, drown me!?
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZENB05120_000_027<tab>Bah, I'm too tired for this. I'm going home...
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZEND05120_000_030<tab>Come on, don't be shy! Just follow the rhythm and let your hips do the rest.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZEND05120_000_031<tab>Hey, what are you─ And I was just getting warmed up.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_CITIZEND05120_000_032<tab>Oh gods, what time is it? The boss'll kill me if I'm late again!
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_040<tab>I saw the whole thing. Thank you so much.

TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_041<tab>They can get carried away sometimes after a few drinks, but they're good folk. Miners and railroad workers, the lot of them, as are most of the people who pass through here.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_042<tab>After a long, grueling day, they'll often stop by and unwind for a good spell.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_043<tab>It's only when they get a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> comfortable that it starts to become a problem.
TEXT_KINGZE002_05120_YANEHWI_000_044<tab>A problem for another day, thanks to you. I know it's not much, but I'd like you to have this. After all your help, it's the least I can offer.
